tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_washing_machine_water_usage (
    washing_machine_id UUID NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    water_usage_gallons INT NOT NULL,
    water_temperature_celsius INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (washing_machine_id, usage_date)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    water_consumed DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,6) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(10,6) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE washing_machines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR,
    model VARCHAR,
    serial_number VARCHAR,
    manufacturing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR,
    alert_message VARCHAR,
    alert_date DATETIME
);
